entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 10:45 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.6°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -24.4°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
